channel.title: HUD shows fire logo in cooling chamber
channel.description: When entering the cooling chamber in bm_c2a3b a fire item will be displayed in the HUD, instead of a frost icon.

item.title: HUD shows fire logo in cooling chamber
item.dc:creator: djcj
item.description:
When entering the cooling chamber in bm_c2a3b a fire item will be displayed in the HUD, instead of a frost icon.

Read full topic
